title: The Scout Office
setting: Scout Service Way Station, Flammarion Highport
atmosphere: Bureaucratic but efficient. The Way Station is busy but well-organized. Mr. Casarii is professional, even sympathetic.
description: The Travellers report to the Scout Service office to claim their inherited ship. They learn it's not at Flammarion - it's stranded on Walston.

triggers.entry: PC with scout ship benefit reports to claim it
triggers.exit: Travellers have documentation and travel plans

automatic: Ship is a Type S Scout/Courier named Highndry
Ship is on Walston, not Flammarion
Previous crew had 'issues' - left the ship stranded
on_request: Walston is a backwater - Class C port
Journey takes about 2 weeks via commercial transport
The Autumn Gold departs tomorrow for Walston

narrator_prompt: You've received word that your application for detached duty has been approved. A Scout Service courier awaits collection - but first, you need to report to the Scout Service Way Station to receive your briefing and documentation. The Way Station is busy with the usual traffic of couriers and administrators.

pc_knows: You've been approved for a detached duty scout ship
You need to report to Scout Service administration
opening_context.pc_goal: Report to administration and receive your briefing

mr-casarii.opening_line: Good day. How can I help you?
mr-casarii.trigger_full_briefing: PC shows ID or mentions detached duty/ship assignment
mr-casarii.post_id_behavior: Provide full briefing on Highndry situation
